title: server chance ?
body: i was just wondering when i/people can chance server ??

replies.body: At first they were turned off for the end of season last year, but then just before they came back the devs ran into some issues where transfers weren't quite working correctly so they needed more time to fix them. It doesn't seem like they've been able to pinpoint exactly what's wrong or how to fix it yet, since there's no concrete date on when they will be back up. They're shooting for late Jan/early Feb now, and [**HollyMonster mentioned**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) there should be some discount attached once they're live again.

Swapping servers was turned off before the season ended and it was supposed to be turned back on almost 3 months ago. Apparently it's because of server problems. I don't hate on riot for much but IMO 3 months to fix a server issue is kind of ridiculous.
